data.name: AppSettingSymmetricAlgorithmProvider_MissingAlgorithm
data.value: The Encryption algorithm is missing, please add the following value to app.settings: <add key="MicroLite.DbEncryptedString.SymmetricAlgorithm" value="AesManaged" /> (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm(v=vs.110).aspx for the fully supported list of values)

data.name: AppSettingSymmetricAlgorithmProvider_MissingKey
data.value: The Encryption key is missing, please add the following value to app.settings: <add key="MicroLite.DbEncryptedString.EncryptionKey" value="replace-with-your-encryption-key" />

data.name: ArgumentNullOrEmpty
data.value: The {0} must be specified

data.name: AttributeMappingConvention_NoTableAttribute
data.value: The type '{0}' cannot be used by MicroLite as is not decorated with a TableAttribute for further information about using the Attribute base Mapping, see the wiki or blog

data.name: DbDriver_ArgumentsCountMismatch
data.value: The number of parameters in the SQL statement and the number of specified parameter arguments should match. However '{0}' parameters used in the SQL statement and '{1}' parameter arguments were specified.

data.name: DbEncryptedStringTypeConverter_CipherTextInvalid
data.value: The cipher text is invalid, it should contain 2 parts separated by an '@'

data.name: ExpandoObjectInfo_NotSupportedReason
data.value: The 'dynamic' type can only be used for queries where an SqlQuery is supplied, it cannot be used for select by identifier, insert, update or delete.

data.name: FluentConfiguration_ConnectionNotFound
data.value: No connection string was found in the <connectionStrings> section of the app/web.config with the name '{0}'.

data.name: IncludeScalar_MultipleColumns
data.value: The scalar query should return a single row with a single column

data.name: Include_SingleRecordExpected
data.value: Multiple records have been returned by the query, the query should return a single row only.

data.name: ObjectDelta_MustContainAtLeastOneChange
data.value: An ObjectDelta must contain at least one change, ensure that you have called AddChange with the property name and new value for each property you wish to update

data.name: ObjectInfo_TypeMustBeClass
data.value: The type '{0}' is not a class and therefore cannot be used by the MicroLite ORM Framework

data.name: ObjectInfo_TypeMustBePublic
data.value: The type '{0}' cannot be used by the MicroLite ORM Framework unless it is declared 'public'

data.name: ObjectInfo_TypeMustHaveDefaultConstructor
data.value: The type '{0}' has no default (parameterless) constructor and therefore cannot be used by the MicroLite ORM Framework

data.name: ObjectInfo_TypeMustNotBeAbstract
data.value: The type '{0}' is abstract and therefore cannot be used by the MicroLite ORM Framework

data.name: PagingOptions_PagesMustBeAtleastOne
data.value: The first page which can be requested is page 1

data.name: PagingOptions_ResultsPerPageMustBeAtLeast1
data.value: There must be at least 1 result per page

data.name: PagingOptions_SkipMustBeZeroOrAbove
data.value: It is not possible to skip less than 0 results

data.name: PagingOptions_TakeMustBeZeroOrAbove
data.value: At least 1 result must be returned

data.name: PocoObjectInfo_IdentifierNotSetForInsert
data.value: The object cannot be inserted as it does not have an identifier value set and the identifier strategy specifies that it should be assigned before being inserted.

data.name: PocoObjectInfo_IdentifierSetForInsert
data.value: The object already has an identifier value so it cannot be inserted

data.name: PocoObjectInfo_NoIdentifierColumn
data.value: No column has been mapped as the identifier for the table '{0}.{1}', as a result it cannot be used for Select by Id, Insert, Update or Delete calls

data.name: PocoObjectInfo_TypeMismatch
data.value: The type of the object {0} does not match the type for the ObjectInfo {1}

data.name: Session_IdentifierNotSetForDelete
data.value: The object does not have an identifier value set so it cannot be deleted

data.name: Session_IdentifierNotSetForUpdate
data.value: The object does not have an identifier value set so it cannot be updated

data.name: Session_PagingOptionsMustNotBeNone
data.value: The paging options must contain a count and offset, use the PagingOptions.ForPage or PagingOptions.SkipTake methods to specify the values

data.name: SqlServerCeDialect_PagedRequiresOrderBy
data.value: SQL Server Compact Edition Requires an ORDER BY clause for paged queries. If there is no specific order you want the results in, order by the primary key of the table being queried

data.name: TableInfo_ColumnMappedMultipleTimes
data.value: The column '{0}' has been mapped multiple times, this usually occurs if multiple properties have the same column name specified in the column attribute

data.name: TableInfo_MultipleIdentifierColumns
data.value: Multiple columns have been mapped as the identifier for the table '{0}.{1}'

data.name: TableInfo_SequenceNameNotSet
data.value: The identifier '{0}' has been mapped using IdentifierStrategy.Sequence but no SequenceName has been specified.

data.name: Transaction_AlreadyCompleted
data.value: The Transaction has been completed

data.name: TupleObjectInfo_NotSupportedReason
data.value: Tuple types can only be used for queries where an SqlQuery is supplied, it cannot be used for select by identifier, insert, update or delete.

data.name: TupleObjectInfo_TupleNotSupported
data.value: Only Tuple<T1> through to Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6,T7> are supported.
